attributes.action: Remove VAR from the Premier League
attributes.additional_details: The Government need to do this as the fans of the game, which are ultimately the reason football is as successful as it is in many ways, are losing the enjoyment of the game from absolutely absurd decisions from so called top officials, who actually have technology in front of them which for some apparent reason does not work.
attributes.background: Get the Premier League to remove VAR as it is ruining the enjoyment of the game with poor and ridiculous decisions that even neutrals in games don’t agree with.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the footballing authorities.
